name: Prohire Employment
description: A dynamic web application for Prohire Employment, a human-in-the-loop employment agency connecting talent with opportunities. Browse jobs, learn about services for employers and job seekers, and get in touch.
prompt: Corrected an inconsistency in the file path used for fetching job data. Standardized all fetch requests to use the relative path './jobs.json' for better application robustness.
